snippet: In North Carolina, where the Democratic faithful have descended to hold their convention, 47 percent of likely voters are supporting the Republican candidate, Mitt Romney, and 43 percent are supporting President Obama.
abstract: In North Carolina, where the Democratic faithful have descended to hold their convention, 47 percent of likely voters are supporting the Republican candidate, Mitt Romney, and 43 percent are supporting President Obama.

headline.main: In North Carolina, Romney and Obama Are in a Tight Race
